Sr. ServiceNow Developer

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY:
Around  10  years  of  professional  experience  in  IT  industry.  Over  6+  years  of  experience  in

Design, Code Construction and Test.

Requests,   Asset   Management,   Configuration   Management,   Service-Now   Administration,

Requests,   Asset   Management,   Configuration   Management,   Service-Now   Administration, 
Incident and Problem Management, Knowledge Management, Reporting, Gauges, Integration 
with Web Services.

Business rules, Data policies, and Client scripts.

Functional   knowledge   and   implementation   experience   of   IT   Service   Management   (ITSM) 
frameworks.
Hands on Experience in ITAM asset management modules and how the information flow between 
ITAM and SAM in the Service Now.
This is a real career opportunity to take complete ownership of a large-scale AWS 
implementation and to join a company who work with the latest technologies, and who offer

In depth knowledge on technical implementation on various modules of Service-now like Incident

Overall architecture and design of a large highly customized deployment that supports primarily 
non-IT users.
Proven record of providing outstanding customer service, talented relationship developer, self-
motivated  professional  who  seeks  challenge  and  opportunity  in  ServiceNow  ITSM  platform 
development, support and management.
